description.text: Your magical connection to nature allows you to entice, fool, and misdirect plants and fungi as though they were people.

sections.Benefit: A verdant spell affects plant creatures (even mindless plant creatures) as if they weren't immune to mind-affecting effects, but it has no effect on other types of creatures. This feat works only on mind-affecting spells.
sections.Normal: Creatures of the plant type are immune to mind-affecting effects.
